item.title: Grab To Launch Autonomous Robobuses In Singapore In 2026, Retrain Drivers For New Tech Roles: 'We See New Kinds Of Jobs Emerging'
item.description: Grab to launch autonomous robobuses in Singapore by 2026, while retraining drivers for new roles. Partners with WeRide and May Mobility. read more

item.title: Stellantis Recalls 320K Jeep Grand Cherokee, Wrangler Hybrid Vehicles Over Battery Fire Risk — NHTSA Issues Parking Warning
item.description: Jeep and Chrysler parent Stellantis recalls 320,065 Jeep Grand Cherokee and Wrangler PHEVs due to fire risk. read more
